scenes.background: (Monica) raises an eyebrow. (Bob) uncrosses his arms and looks at you.
scenes.description: 'So, what's the plan? Are you going to help us or stick to your break?'

options.text: I understand the urgency, but I need to recharge. Let's find a temporary fix.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency and proposed a short-term solution, showing balanced perception and empathy, though your motivation and self-regulation could be higher.

options.text: I can't extend my help right now. We need to better delegate tasks in the future.
options.analysis: You stood firm on your boundaries and suggested future improvements, demonstrating strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help immediately.

options.text: It's frustrating to always be the fallback. We definitely need a better system.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, which might strain your relationship with colleagues.
